name: broadcast-notification-system
description: An open, simple and highly customisable notification/alert system for live streams on Twitch and YouTube.
author: Markus Wiegand <markus.wiegand@outlook.com>

scripts.build-js: browserify public/dashboard/js/main.js > public/dashboard/js/main.bundle.js && browserify public/dashboard/js/charts.js > public/dashboard/js/charts.bundle.js && browserify public/template/js/main.js > public/template/js/main.bundle.js
